branchCategory.name: CKZP
branchCategory.description: <p>Shot pin cylinder series CKZP is designed for both high precision and positioning repeatability. &nbsp;Also known as a locating pin cylinder, the configurations for the CKZP include bore sizes equivalent to 57mm and 71mm with strokes of either 25mm or 50mm. &nbsp;The proximity switch sensor and port thread type can also be selected. &nbsp;Widely used in automotive applications, the mounting is based on NAAMS standard (71mm bore)</p>

branchItem.name: CKZP, Shot Pin Cylinder
branchItem.description: <p>Shot pin cylinder series CKZP is designed for both high precision and positioning repeatability. &nbsp;Also known as a locating pin cylinder, the configurations for the CKZP include bore sizes equivalent to 57mm and 71mm with strokes of either 25mm or 50mm. &nbsp;The proximity switch sensor and port thread type can also be selected. &nbsp;Widely used in automotive applications, the mounting is based on NAAMS standard (71mm bore)</p>
